mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UserAuditRecord ( userId, businessId, unAuthorizedAccessMessage, ipAddress, loginDate, logoutDate, recordDate ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{businessId}, #{unAuthorizedAccessMessage}, #{ipAddress}, #{loginDate, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{logoutDate, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{recordDate, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} )
